original_title: UNP held Borella Asana Balamandala meeting
original_body_lines: The United National Party's (UNP) Borella Asana Balamandala meeting was held yesterday at Dematagoda Vidyalankara Pirivena under the Chairmanship of party Deputy Leader Ruwan Wijewardena and Chief of Presidential Staff Sagala Ratnayake. A large gathering of party members  participated in this event. Pix by Pradeep Pathirana
